name: Kidde Smoke & Carbon Monoxide Detector, 10-Year Battery Powered, Voice Alerts, LED Warning Light Indicators, 2 Pack
short_description: 2-IN-1 DETECTION: Alerts you to both smoke & carbon monoxide (CO) using a single, cost-effective device.

NEVER-CHANGE 10-YEAR BATTERY: No low battery chirps or battery changes for 10 years & saves up to $40 over the life of the detector. (10-yr limited warranty on alarm, not a battery performance claim.)

ENHANCED SENSING TECHNOLOGY: Reduces false smoke alarms often caused by cooking. Comprehensively tested to meet the latest UL standards, meets UL 217 9th Edition, UL 2034 4th Edition, & FCC standards.
VOICE ALERTS: Crystal-clear voice alerts will say "Fire!" when smoke is detected or "Warning! Carbon Monoxide!" if CO is detected, so you can react quickly.
SELF-TESTING ALARM: Internal components ensure alarm is always operating as expected. Not a substitute for a manual push test, perform a button test once per week to verify alarm operation.
3 LED NOTIFICATIONS: LED lights indicate alarm status, green = normal operation, amber = operating error, red = smoke or carbon monoxide detected & a loud 85-decibel alarm will sound.
EASY INSTALLATION: No wiring needed, simply mount the bracket onto the ceiling and twist & click the 5-inch smoke & CO alarm into the bracket.
10-YEAR LIMITED WARRANTY: Warranty begins when the alarm is powered on. If that date is unknown, it should be assumed that alarms should be replaced.
product_description: Experience the next level of fire safety with the Kidde Smoke & Carbon Monoxide Detector, 10-Year Battery Powered, Voice Alerts, LED Warning Light Indicators, 2 Pack, model 30CUD10-V. This smoke & CO detector has enhanced sensing technology that reduces false alarms often caused by cooking and sends fast alerts that help give your family more time to get out safely. To detect carbon monoxide, an electrochemical sensor is used. This alarm offers a modern 5-inch design ideal for all living spaces such as living rooms, hallways, kitchens, & bedrooms. Voice alerts clearly announce “Fire!” or “Warning Carbon Monoxide!” to help identify which hazard is detected. Comprehensively tested and designed to the latest UL standard for safety and reliability, the 5-inch combination alarm is powered by a 10-year built-in lithium battery, so you never have to change a battery for the life of the detector (not a battery performance claim). Plus, it’s self-testing and easy to install with the included twist-and-click mounting bracket. This Kidde combination alarm is equipped with end-of-life notifications that will beep to remind you it’s time to replace it at the of its 10-year lifespan. Meets requirements of 9th Edition UL 217, UL 2034 4th Edition, FCC, and CSFM.

name: First Alert Combination Smoke & Carbon Monoxide Alarm, Interconnect Hardwire Detector with Battery Backup and Voice & Location Alerts, SMCO100V-AC, 1-Pack
short_description: First Alert's Precision Detection advanced sensing technology complies with new industry standards to reduce cooking nuisance alarms and provides early warning in the event of a home fire emergency
Voice & location alerts tell you what the danger is and its location to help you escape safely
Through early warning interconnect, when one alarm sounds, all compatible alarms* will sound
Battery backup provides continuous protection during power outages
Quick Connect Plug allows for easy installation with no need to rewire
product_description: Be alerted to the type of danger and its location in your home with the First Alert SMCO100V-AC Interconnect Hardwire Combination Smoke & Carbon Monoxide Alarm with Battery Backup and Voice & Location Alerts. Easily install using the quick connect plug. Plus interconnect compatible alarms to create a whole home alarm system to help provide an early warning. Also the alarm is also equipped with First Alert's Precision Detection advanced sensing technology and meets new industry standards.

name: Kidde, 20SDR, Smoke Detector, AA Battery Powered, LED Warning Light Indicators
short_description: DETECTS SMOKE: Sounds a loud 85-decibel alarm when smoke is detected - 3 long beeps with red LED light flashing in time, repeating.
ENHANCED SENSING TECHNOLOGY: Reduces false alarms often caused by cooking. Comprehensively tested to meet the latest UL standards, meets UL 217 9th Edition & FCC standards.
NO WIRING NEEDED: Operates on 2-AA alkaline batteries (included) providing easy installation, simply mount the bracket onto the ceiling and twist & click the 5-inch smoke alarm into the bracket.
SELF-TESTING ALARM: Internal components ensure alarm is always operating as expected. Not a substitute for a manual push test, perform a button test once per week to verify alarm operation.
3 LED NOTIFICATIONS: LED lights indicate alarm status, green = normal operation, amber = operating error, red = smoke detected.
TEST & HUSH BUTTON: Makes it easy to test the 5-inch smoke detector and silence false alarms, should they occur.
BATTERY REPLACEMENT: Batteries should be replaced every 6 months, a low battery chirp alerts you when batteries need replacing.
10-YEAR LIMITED WARRANTY: Warranty begins when the alarm is powered on. If that date is unknown, it should be assumed that alarms should be replaced.
product_description: Experience the next level of fire safety with the Kidde Smoke Detector, AA Battery Powered, LED Warning Light Indicators, model 20SDR. This smoke detector has enhanced sensing technology that reduces false alarms often caused by cooking and sends fast alerts that help give your family more time to get out safely. This alarm offers a modern 5-inch design ideal for all living spaces such as living rooms, hallways, kitchens, & bedrooms. Comprehensively tested and designed to the latest UL standard for safety and reliability, the 5-inch smoke alarm is powered by 2 replaceable AA alkaline batteries (included) for continual detection even during outages. Batteries should be replaced every 6 months or when the alarm sounds a low battery chirp. In addition, it’s self-testing and easy to install with the included twist-and-click mounting bracket. This Kidde smoke alarm is equipped with end-of-life notifications that will beep to remind you it’s time to replace it at the of its 10-year lifespan. Meets requirements of 9th Edition UL 217 and FCC. Does not meet requirements for CSFM.

name: SITERLINK Smoke Detectors 10 Year Battery Operated,UL217-9th Listed Smoke Alarm with Test-Silence Button,Photoelectric Sensor Fire Alarms Smoke Detectors with LED Lights for Home, GS525A (1 Pack)
short_description: 【10-Year Battery for Peace of Mind】GS525A smoke detector features a 10-year sealed lithium battery, ensuring reliable protection without the need for constant battery replacements. You’ll never have to worry about dead batteries again, providing long-term peace of mind for your family.

【UL Listed for Safety & Compliance】Our smoke detector is UL217-9th Edition listed, adhering to the highest safety and performance standards. You can trust that this product has been rigorously tested and certified to provide reliable protection for your home.

【Advanced Photoelectric Sensor Technology】Equipped with a photoelectric sensor, this smoke detector is designed to quickly respond to slow, smoldering fires, reducing false alarms and offering superior protection. It’s the perfect choice for homes seeking dependable fire safety.

【Advanced AI technology】Equipped with advanced AI technology, Our GS525A smoke detector actively learns your home environment to significantly reduce false alarms caused by dust and steam, ensuring reliable and intelligent fire safety protection for your family ﻿

【Easy Installation】The compact smoke alarm are 1.32"D x 3.94"W x 3.94"H.We provide both magnets and screws for versatile installation options-no complicated wiring required, ensuring you can easily mount the smoke detector on walls or ceilings.
【Regulatory Compliance】 New York State's most recent legislation requires all households to complete the replacement of their 10-year sealed batteries by December 31, 2025.

name: 4 Pack Smoke Detector Fire Alarms 9V Battery Operated Photoelectric Sensor Smoke Alarms Easy to Install with Light Sound Warning, Test Button,9V Battery Included Fire Safety for Home Hotel(912-4)
short_description: Accurate & Sensitive: The small size smoke alarm adopts photoelectric technology to detect smoke, which is more sensitive to light smoke and slow smoldering fires and more quickly to remind you. Keep your home safe 24/7

Photoelectric Technology&Material: Fire-Retardant ABS V0 Level. 9V Battery-Powered Photoelectric sensor Smoke Alarm. photoelectric technology which is optimized to detect slow smoldering fires which generate light smoke, little heat and may smolder from all directions for hours before bursting into flames.

Test Button: Test smoke alarm every week by pressing the test button in the middle of the cover for 5 seconds. Please change batteries when smoke detector inform low battery, smoke alarm “chirp” every 32 seconds and the red LED flashes at the same time

Sound & LED Warning: If fire alarm detects smoke or combustion particles in the air, it will sound in 85db and red LED will flash rapidly to remind every member to check. If fault, please clean dust or smoke inside smoke alarm with fan

Home Protection: According to US data analysis, a family fire begins every 38 seconds. The faster you know about the fire, the sooner you start moving your family, and the smoke alarm at work reduces the risk of home fire deaths by 50%

10 Years Warranty: If there are any problems with our products ,you can contact us ,we must reply you within 24hours as soon as possible.NOTE: Please test it once a month to ensure that the smoke alarm works properly. Please clean up the dust on the alarm every 6 months to prevent the smoke alarm from being clogged or blocked.

name: X-Sense 10-Year Battery Combination Smoke Carbon Monoxide Alarm Detector with Large LCD Display (Standalone Model)
short_description: Please Note: SC07 is a basic standalone unit; it does not support wireless interconnection, does not have Wi-Fi, and cannot be used with a base station; for interconnection, search for SC07-W. For Wi-Fi functionality, look for SC07-WX or SC07-MR
2-in-1 Protection: The combination smoke and CO detector detects both smoke and carbon monoxide faster and more accurately using a photoelectric smoke sensor and an electrochemical CO sensor
10-Year Battery: The fire and CO alarm is built with a sealed lithium battery that provides 10 years of continuous power, saving you from changing batteries and power outage
Combination Alarm with CO Readings: When the alarm is triggered, the LCD will display the CO concentration and illuminate. In standby mode, the LCD turns off to ensure you are not disturbed
Simple Installation: Requires no rewiring; easy to mount this smoke and carbon monoxide alarm on any wall or ceiling with the included mounting bracket, screws, and anchor plugs
Informative LCD: Displays real-time CO levels from 30–999 ppm (parts per million) taken from the surrounding air, as well as battery level and working status

name: Kidde, 20SA10, Hardwired Smoke Detector, 10-Year Battery Backup, Interconnectable, LED Warning Light Indicators
short_description: DETECTS SMOKE: Sounds a loud 85-decibel alarm when smoke is detected - 3 long beeps with red LED light flashing in time, repeating.
HARDWIRED and 10-YEAR BATTERY BACKUP: Operates on 120V AC wiring (installed in the ceiling). No battery changes for 10 years and saves up to 40 Dollar over the life of the detector.
ENHANCED SENSING TECHNOLOGY: Reduces false alarms often caused by cooking. Comprehensively tested to meet the latest UL standards, meets UL 217 9th Edition and FCC standards.
SELF-TESTING ALARM: Internal components ensure alarm is always operating as expected. Not a substitute for a manual push test, perform a button test once per week to verify alarm operation.
INTERCONNECT CAPABILITY: When one alarm sounds, they all sound, so you can get out faster. (Different models offer different interconnection options and requirements. See User Guide for more info.)
3 LED NOTIFICATIONS: LED lights indicate alarm status, green - normal operation, amber - operating error, red - smoke detected.
TEST and HUSH BUTTON: Makes it easy to test the 5-inch smoke detector and silence false alarms, should they occur.
10-YEAR WARRANTY: Begins when alarm is powered on. If that date is unknown, it should be assumed that alarms should be replaced. (10-yr limited warranty on alarm, not a battery performance claim.)
product_description: Experience the next level of fire safety with the Kidde Hardwired Smoke Detector, 10-Year Battery Backup, Interconnectable, LED Warning Light Indicators, model 20SA10. This smoke detector has enhanced sensing technology that reduces false alarms often caused by cooking and sends fast alerts that help give your family more time to get out safely. Plus, it is interconnected so when one alarm sounds, they all do so you never miss an emergency (see user guide for compatibility with other Kidde models). This alarm offers a modern 5-inch design ideal for all living spaces such as living rooms, hallways, kitchens, & bedrooms. Comprehensively tested and designed to the latest UL standard for safety and reliability, the 5-inch smoke alarm is powered by 120V AC wiring with a 10-year built-in lithium battery, so you never have to change a battery for the life of the detector (not a battery performance claim). In addition, the detector is self-testing and easy to install with the included twist-and-click mounting bracket. Meets requirements of 9th Edition UL 217, FCC, and CSFM.

name: First Alert SMI100-AC, Hardwire Interconnect Smoke Alarm with Battery Backup, 1-Pack
short_description: First Alert's Precision Detection advanced sensing technology complies with new industry standards to reduce cooking nuisance alarms and provides early warning in the event of a home fire emergency.
Through early warning interconnect, when one alarm sounds, all compatible alarms will sound
Battery backup provides continuous protection during power outages
Alarm indicator visually identifies the unit that initiated the alarm

This hardwire smoke alarm is easy to install and replace existing alarms with no need to rewire. Plus interconnect compatible alarms to create a whole home alarm system to help provide an early warning.
